description:
oslo.config introduced URIOpt in 3.12.
We can use this for validate URL configs.
title: Use URIOpt

comments.content:

commit b5bd80f9ac479ffe262541edac91986cb22af0ad
Author: Masaki Matsushita <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jul 6 15:33:44 2016 +0900

    Improve Config Validation
    
    This commit improves configuration validation.
    
    * URIOpt to validate URL strings.
    * HostnameOpt to validate hostnames
    
    Change-Id: I4a6edf1faafbd242ca652df9a1eacd941288774a
    Closes-Bug: #1599034

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Michael Still (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/337477
Reason: This patch has been sitting unchanged for more than 12 weeks. I am therefore going to abandon it to keep the nova review queue sane. Please feel free to restore the change if you're still working on it.

commit 463fd7a11baa7618e14e355b162c06f3ccf2c2b2
Author: Takashi NATSUME <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jun 30 17:20:52 2017 +0900

    Use URIOpt
    
    Replace StrOpt with URIOpt.
    But 'serial_port_service_uri' in nova/conf/vmware.py
    is excluded because it can be non URI format(*1).
    
    *1: https://github.com/openstack/vmware-vspc/blob/master/README.rst
    
    Change-Id: I595c55798b482009c42261c3603a58f82e89877c
    Closes-Bug: #1599034
